TopicTitle: The all new "how old are you?" thread

Articles.Content:
So? how do you youngsters feel being lumped together?

Edited April 17, 2014 by Uncle Mort

55 as of March.

Which means I was 10 sitting in front of a 19" B/W TV watching the moon landing.

Some things only come with age.....Supposedly wisdom and serenity, I got cheated, only got painful joints and deteriorating eyesight.....
